segments.text: I notice the kitchen setup right away, with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the water cascading over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she's not reacting at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron look so proper amid the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the boy on the stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back, that's alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames a pretty garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light pouring in, highlighting the puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes on the counter, all innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is happening without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors swung open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a sad mess if they're not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of worry and wonder watching it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
